# Welcome

Welcome to the 2.0 version of the redhot analyses. 


# Purpose

The purpose of this repository is to document the analyses completed for the urban redcedar heat study. 



# Softwares

* All data wrangling and analyses were completed with 
  + R version 4.5.1 (2025-06-13)
  + R Studio 2025.05.1
  + QGIS-LTR 3.40-5-Bratislava
